DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that misexpression of vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) in the Cerebrospinal fluid of preterm infants can be used as a biomarker to predict the risk for developing white matter damage.
DOC.brief_title: VEGF as a Prognostic Factor for White Matter Damage in Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Preterm infants undergoing lumbar puncture. Preterm with IVH or known infection or meningitis.
